message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! With over 50% of my previous sales being high-quality, I'm confident that this one has a good chance of being high-quality too. I'm willing to take a risk and sell it to you for $10000. What do you say? Will you take the chance?
I'll take the chance! I'm willing to buy the product and hope it's high-quality.
